title: ARAM Bots
body: Why are there so many bots in ARAM????? Why cant Rito sort this out? At least make an option to report them.... It just ruins the game :(

replies.body:
It's okay. They will just remove it like Dominion to stop the bots playing it.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Agreed, almost every single game has at least one. It's really annoying having most of your team just spin around behind a tower

Hey there,

There is currently an option to report them in the post game screen, "Cheating".

Please make sure that you are reporting these players so they can be dealt with in due time, if you forget to submit a report, or wish to submit further evidence please feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will forward it to the appropriate team.

See you on the Abyss :)
Just make sure you actually report them, because if you don't, Riot can't know to ban them
